question: Who of the following were crowned Mrs India-Pride of Nation 2017 along with Poonam Gaur?
explanation: Mayanka Patel and Poonam Gaur were crowned Mrs India-Pride of Nation 2017 contest in two different categories, in Gurgaon. Mayanka Patel from Mumbai was named winner in Group A - 21 years to 34 years women's category. Poonam Gaur from Gurugram won the crown in Group B- 34 years to 45 years women's category. The Mrs India-Pride of Nation 2017 contest was organised by Glamour Gurgaon. The Grand Finale consisted of 3 rounds and 61 contestants participated.
